dcterms:creator: Matthias Plappert
Christian Mandery
Tamim Asfour
dcterms:description: The KIT Motion-Language Dataset contains 3,911 recordings of full-body motion in the Master Motor Map form, along with textual descriptions for each motion. It has a total of 6,278 annotations in English, where each motion recording has one or more annotations that explain the action.
dcterms:title: KIT Motion-Language Dataset (KITML)

dcterms:creator: Chuan Guo
Shihao Zou
Xinxin Zuo
Sen Wang
Wei Ji
Xingyu Li
Li Cheng
dcterms:description: HumanML3D is a dataset that contains 14,616 motions annotated by 44,970 textual descriptions. It is developed by adding textual annotations to existing motion-capture datasets.
dcterms:title: HumanML3D
